messages.content: Dis-moi quel prompt utiliser dans stable diffusion pour dessiner des images dans un ciel nocturne avec des étoiles
Utilisez le prompt suivant : "Dessinez une scène nocturne avec un ciel étoilé, où différentes images et formes se forment en utilisant les étoiles comme éléments essentiels du dessin."
tell me which stable diffusion prompt i can use to obtain a drawing of a dog made of stars in a starry night sky
Use the following prompt: "Create a drawing of a starry night sky, where the stars come together to form the shape of a dog, as if it's a constellation."
It doesn't seems to work. Other ideas ?

I apologize for the confusion. Since AI is text-based, I misunderstood your question. If you want to create an actual image or drawing, you'll need to use an image-generating AI or graphic software. Describing the scene or idea in words will not generate an actual image. You can use tools like Photoshop, GIMP or seek the help of an artist who can create the starry dog image based on your description.
